Footer.address: 227 Nguyen Van Cu, Ward 4, District 5, Ho Chi Minh City

LoginPage.title: If you are already a member you can login with your email address and password.

RegisterPage.title: Become a member and start using the amazing features of ODL.
RegisterPage.passwordRequired: Password must be at least 6 characters
RegisterPage.nameRequired: Name must be at least 6 characters

HomePage.title: Conquer the steering wheel, surpass all limits!
HomePage.description: ODL offers a fast and convenient driving test review solution, helping you study anytime, anywhere with benefits. With a system of practical tests and multinational support, ODL accompanies you on the easiest way to take the driving test.

ChooseRegionPage.description: ODL is a multinational driving test review website that helps you study and take practice tests according to the regulations of many countries around the world.
ChooseRegionPage.vnDescription: The driving theory test in Vietnam tests knowledge of traffic laws, road signs and handling situations through multiple choice questions. Candidates must achieve the required score, including failing questions, to pass this part of the test.
ChooseRegionPage.ausDescription: The Australian driving theory test tests knowledge of traffic laws, road signs and handling situations through multiple choice questions. The website supports test preparation for many states, helping candidates practice according to the regulations and requirements of each region.

VietnamTestPage.title: THEORY TEST
VietnamTestPage.description: The Theory Test function simulates the official driving test, helping users test their knowledge of traffic laws, signs, and situation handling skills. The test is structured and contains the correct content according to regulations, including failing questions (if any), providing an experience close to the actual exam.
VietnamTestPage.a1Description: Two-wheeled motorcycles have a cylinder capacity of 50cc to 125cc.
VietnamTestPage.aDescription: Two-wheeled motorcycles with a cylinder capacity of 125 cm3 or more and other types of vehicles specified for class A1 driving license.
VietnamTestPage.bDescription: Passenger cars with up to 8 seats (excluding the driver's seat); trucks and specialized vehicles with a total designed weight of up to 3,500 kg; types of cars identified for a Class B driving license pulling a trailer with a total designed weight of up to 750 kg.
VietnamTestPage.b1Description: Three-wheeled motorcycles and other vehicles specified for class A1 driving license.
VietnamTestPage.b2Description: for drivers of passenger cars with less than 9 seats, trucks under 3,500 kg and are allowed to work as drivers in the transport business.
VietnamTestPage.c1Description: Trucks and special-purpose vehicles with a total designed weight of over 3,500 kg to 7,500 kg; types of trucks specified for class C1 driving licenses pulling trailers with a total designed weight of up to 750 kg; types of vehicles specified for class B driving licenses.
VietnamTestPage.cDescription: for drivers of trucks and tractors with a load capacity of 3,500 kg or more.
VietnamTestPage.defDescription: for drivers of passenger cars with 10 to 30 seats; over 30 seats; drivers of trailers

ChooseTestPage.title: Type of license
ChooseTestPage.description: Issued to drivers of two-wheeled motorbikes with a cylinder capacity of up to 125 cm3 or with an electric motor power of up to 11 kW.
ChooseTestPage.testDescription: The Random Test function helps users experience the real exam by generating random exams from available question sets. Each time the exam is taken, the system will automatically select different questions, ensuring no duplication and helping learners get used to the diversity of the exam.
ChooseTestPage.providedTitle: TRY THE TEST WITH AVAILABLE QUESTIONS
ChooseTestPage.notReadyTitle: Not ready for a practice test?
ChooseTestPage.notReadyDescriptionP2: first. Here, you can review traffic laws, signs, and practice test questions to gain confidence.

TestPage.title: Take the test
TestPage.description: The mock test simulates the official exam, helping users test their knowledge of traffic laws, signs, and handling situations. The test is built according to the prescribed structure and content, including zero-point questions, providing an experience close to the real exam, helping learners assess their level of readiness.
TestPage.question: Question

ResultPage.notSatisfied: Not satisfied with the results? Do it again now
ResultPage.otherTest: We have many more tests, check it out now!
ResultPage.reviewWrongQuestion: Review the questions you got wrong.

LearningOverall.title: Type of license
LearningOverall.learningPathDescription: The Pathway Learning function guides users through practice from basic to advanced through exams arranged in a logical order. The system divides the content into sections, helping you gradually get acquainted with the question set and improve your skills before taking the actual exam.
LearningOverall.learningDescription: lets you choose any questions, cues, or content to review at your leisure, allowing for flexible learning and focused practice on the areas you need to improve.
LearningOverall.theoryDescription: Help you review all traffic law knowledge through official multiple choice questions.
LearningOverall.trafficSignsDescription: Focus on reviewing important questions that must be answered correctly to pass the exam.
LearningOverall.criticalQuestionsDescription: Help you review all traffic law knowledge through official multiple choice questions.
LearningOverall.reviewDescription: Save and help you practice your wrongly answered questions to improve your score and master your knowledge.
LearningOverall.readyToTestDescription: If you're ready, start the Practice Test now to test your knowledge and assess your level of preparation!

LearningPathPage.question: Question
LearningPathPage.testReady: Do you want to take the final chapter test?

LearningCategory.title: DRIVING LICENSE LEARNING ROADMAP
LearningCategory.description: The study path helps you track your review process in a scientific and sequential way. Complete each chapter to unlock the next content and get closer to passing the driving test!
LearningCategory.testFuncDescription: When you are ready for the practice test, start with the tests that closely match
LearningCategory.signFuncDescription: Provides a list of signs with detailed explanations, helping you memorize quickly and accurately.
LearningCategory.criticalFuncDescription: Focus on reviewing important questions that must be answered correctly to pass the exam.
LearningCategory.challengeBankFuncDescription: Save and help you practice your wrongly answered questions to improve your score and master your knowledge.
